title: Diary of Steve the Noob 12 (An Unofficial Minecraft Book)
description: OMG! This is my longest book yet! I don't plan for this to be the norm, just giving y'all a heads up. :) This Minecraft diary is over 13,000 words and includes 30 pictures to accompany the entries. Steve travels with Cindy to visit Wanda in hopes that the witch has a cure for Cindy's condition. But dealing with the witch is always tricky business. Read this next volume of the Steve the Noob series to find what happens next. This book is a work of fanfiction; it is not an official Minecraft book. It is not endorsed, authorized, licensed, sponsored, or supported by Mojang AB, Microsoft Corp. or any other entity owning or controlling rights to the Minecraft name, trademarks or copyrights. author: Steve the Noob
